data.name: pegasus_core|Button_Name_Trample_Button
data.tooltip:
Become resilient and push nearby units out of the your path, periodically stunning them, and dealing <d ref="duckiesHeroMagmadonTrample_PeriodicDamageRadius.amount  / duckiesHeroMagmadonTrample_CasterBuff.periodic_duration" style="Bold"/> damage each second around yourself.

Lasts <d ref="duckiesHeroMagmadonTrample_CasterBuff.duration"/> seconds.

<AttackCallout>Destroys trees.</>
